metadata.title: CVE-2024-26619 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:riscv: Fix module loading free orderReverse order of kfree calls to resolve use-after-free error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
